creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

■□■ Video about YAMAP ■□■
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

■□■ Three Main Features of YAMAP ■□■
1) Safe
◆YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.co.jp/support

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

■□■ YAMAP Operating Company ■□■
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
TEL : +81-92-710-5511
descriptionShort: YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.com/forums

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

title: YAMAP - Social Trekking GPS App -

container.value:
〒812-0011
福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

■□■ Video about YAMAP ■□■
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

■□■ Three Main Features of YAMAP ■□■
1) Safe
◆YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.com/forums

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

■□■ YAMAP Operating Company ■□■
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
TEL : +81-92-710-5511
descriptionShort: YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

title: YAMAP - Social Trekking GPS App -

container.value:
〒812-0011
福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

■□■ Video about YAMAP ■□■
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

■□■ Three Main Features of YAMAP ■□■
1) Safe
◆YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.com/forums

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

■□■ YAMAP Operating Company ■□■
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
TEL : +81-92-710-5511
descriptionShort: YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

■□■ Video about YAMAP ■□■
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

■□■ Three Main Features of YAMAP ■□■
1) Safe
◆YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.com/forums

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

■□■ YAMAP Operating Company ■□■
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
TEL : +81-92-710-5511

◆YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.com/forums

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

container.value:

福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

■□■ Video about YAMAP ■□■
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

■□■ Three Main Features of YAMAP ■□■
1) Safe
◆YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
◆ YAMAP Hybrid Maps
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
◆You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

■□■ Online Support Message Board ■□■
https://yamap.com/forums

■□■ Wear ■□■
With YAMAP on Wear, you can track you location in real time, without cell service, using YAMAP’s offline maps.
While in the outdoors, check useful info like elevation or distance traveled through YAMAP on your smart watch. When you finish your outdoor adventure, you can post your activity directly from your Wear device.

YAMAP is supported on Android Wear devices with built in GPS functionality such as the Casio Pro Trek line of smart watches.

■□■ Note ■□■
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

■□■ YAMAP Operating Company ■□■
YAMAP INC.

title: YAMAP - Social Trekking GPS App -

container.value:
〒812-0011
福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Wear
YAMAP also provides the Wear app.
Please check the following points before you start using the Wear app.

- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F10, F20, F21, F30).

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation or distance during trekking
- Uploading 'ACTIVITY REPORT'- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/
descriptionShort: YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

title: YAMAP - Social Trekking GPS App -

container.value:
〒812-0011
福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Wear
YAMAP also provides the Wear app.
Please check the following points before you start using the Wear app.

- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F10, F20, F21, F30).

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation or distance during trekking
- Uploading 'ACTIVITY REPORT'- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Thanks to our friends from Icons8 for their icons.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/

YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share

- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.

- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F20, F21, F30) and is not available for other wear devices.
- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- When you download a map, you need to open paired YAMAP Smartphone app. Please search a map and open map detail page then tap "Forward map to smartwatch" in option menu.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Wear
YAMAP also provides the Wear app.
Please check the following important points before you start using the Wear app.

- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F20, F21, F30) and is not available for other wear devices.
- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- When you download a map, you need to open paired YAMAP Smartphone app. Please search a map and open map detail page then tap "Forward map to smartwatch" in option menu.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/
descriptionShort: YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.

YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Wear
YAMAP also provides the Wear app.
Please check the following important points before you start using the Wear app.

- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F20, F21, F30) and is not available for other wear devices.
- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- When you download a map, you need to open paired YAMAP Smartphone app. Please search a map and open map detail page then tap "Forward map to smartwatch" in option menu.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/

title: YAMAP -Social Trekking GPS App

container.value:
〒812-0011
福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Wear
YAMAP also provides the Wear app.
Please check the following important points before you start using the Wear app.

- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F20, F21, F30) and is not available for other wear devices.
- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- When you download a map, you need to open paired YAMAP Smartphone app. Please search a map and open map detail page then tap "Forward map to smartwatch" in option menu.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/
descriptionShort: YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Wear
YAMAP also provides the Wear app.
Please check the following important points before you start using the Wear app.

- The Wear app can only use on CASIO Smart Outdoor Watch (WSD-F20, F21, F30) and is not available for other wear devices.
- The Wear app cannot be used standalone. When you start using the Wear app, you need pairing with the YAMAP Smartphone app that has already logged in.
- When you download a map, you need to open paired YAMAP Smartphone app. Please search a map and open map detail page then tap "Forward map to smartwatch" in option menu.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/sections/900000177906

The following functions can be used with the Wear app after pairing.

- Viewing offline maps
- Browsing information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Upload 'ACTIVITY REPORT'

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/
descriptionShort: YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

Please see the help center for detailed information such as pairing.

descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone.
YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity.
Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations.

YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MEdrty6Zdzk

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail : support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center : https://help.yamap.com/
descriptionShort: YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.

YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.
YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your device, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.

▲ Note
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan. YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone. YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity. Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations. YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://youtu.be/wDq25Yc07nY


▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.

YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your smartphone, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.


▲ Major awards / podiums of YAMAP
- Good Design Special Award "Monodzukuri Design Award (Small and Medium Enterprise Agency Director General Award)" won (2014)
- Selected as 'Venture 100 to Move Japan' at the magazine AERA（August 24, 2015）
- B DASH CAMP "Pitch Arena" champion (2015)
- Ministry of the Environment (Japan) · National Park Official Partner (2017)
- Red Herring Top 100 Global Winner (2017)


▲ Regarding the foreground service permissions
- Foreground location data
YAMAP app requires foreground location data in order to record your trajectory. Depending on the smartphone you are using, you may not be able to obtain it correctly. For more details, please check the following help page:
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/articles/900000921583

- Foreground screen recording
The 3D replay feature, which allows you to review your trajectory with photos, needs foreground screen recording when recording videos.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/articles/21271985055769

▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.

- Ministry of the Environment (Japan) · National Park Official Partner (2017)
- Red Herring Top 100 Global Winner (2017)


▲ Wear OS
YAMAP also supports Wear OS.
Please check the following important points before using the Wear OS version of the app.

- The Wear OS version of the app cannot be used standalone. When you start using it, you need pairing with a smartphone where the YAMAP smartphone app is installed.
- When you launch the Wear OS version of the app, please start activity using the YAMAP Smartphone app. Then, Wear OS version of the app screen will switch to the activity information screen automatically.

The following functions can be used after pairing.

- Browsing activity information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Displaying your trail on the screen


▲ Regarding the foreground service permissions
- Foreground location data
YAMAP app requires foreground location data in order to record your trajectory. Depending on the smartphone you are using, you may not be able to obtain it correctly. For more details, please check the following help page:

The 3D replay feature, which allows you to review your trajectory with photos, needs foreground screen recording when recording videos.

container.value:
〒812-0011
福岡市博多区博多駅前3-23-20 博多AGビル6F

creator: YAMAP INC.
descriptionHtml:
YAMAP is The Most Popular Outdoor App in Japan. YAMAP makes your outdoor adventures, like mountain trekking and skiing, safer and more fun with your smartphone. YAMAP does not require a mobile signal to track and log your outdoor activity. Our detailed outdoor maps provide information you need like elevation, parking and trailhead locations. YAMAP lets you build an online outdoor journal easily so you can share your love of the outdoors!

▲ Video about YAMAP
https://youtu.be/wDq25Yc07nY


▲ Three Main Features of YAMAP
1) Safe
YAMAP makes your smartphone a special GPS device for the outdoors.

YAMAP could provide accurate positioning information with YAMAP's maps in Japan and your smartphone's GPS, even if you are in places not reached by mobile phone signals, such as in mountainous regions.

2) Convenience
YAMAP's maps are used as digital ones with your smartphone, and as ones on paper by downloading them to your PC (or tablet PC).

3) Share
You can easily share your outdoor data with your family and friends through YAMAP. Finishing your outdoor and saving your data, you can uploads it to your online 'ACTIVITY REPORT' where you can view your route, outdoor data, and a comprehensive workout history.


▲ Major awards / podiums of YAMAP
- Good Design Special Award "Monodzukuri Design Award (Small and Medium Enterprise Agency Director General Award)" won (2014)
- Selected as 'Venture 100 to Move Japan' at the magazine AERA（August 24, 2015）
- B DASH CAMP "Pitch Arena" champion (2015)
- Ministry of the Environment (Japan) · National Park Official Partner (2017)
- Red Herring Top 100 Global Winner (2017)


▲ Wear OS
YAMAP also supports Wear OS.
Please check the following important points before using the Wear OS version of the app.

- The Wear OS version of the app cannot be used standalone. When you start using it, you need pairing with a smartphone where the YAMAP smartphone app is installed.
- When you launch the Wear OS version of the app, please start activity using the YAMAP Smartphone app. Then, Wear OS version of the app screen will switch to the activity information screen automatically.

The following functions can be used after pairing.

- Browsing activity information like elevation and distance during trekking
- Displaying your trail on the screen


▲ Regarding the foreground service permissions
- Foreground location data
YAMAP app requires foreground location data in order to record your trajectory. Depending on the smartphone you are using, you may not be able to obtain it correctly. For more details, please check the following help page:
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/articles/900000921583

- Foreground screen recording
The 3D replay feature, which allows you to review your trajectory with photos, needs foreground screen recording when recording videos.
https://help.yamap.com/hc/ja/articles/21271985055769

- Data sync
The foreground data sync feature is employed for the purpose of downloading map data.

▲ Terms of service
https://yamap.com/terms

▲ Privacy policy
https://yamap.com/terms/privacy

▲ YAMAP Operating Company
YAMAP INC.　
E-mail: support@yamap.co.jp
Help Center: https://help.yamap.com/
descriptionShort: YAMAP is Outdoor App in Japan.
